revised_title: Obituary of Augustus Edward Hough Love: A Pioneering Mathematician and Physicist
tldr: The obituary of Augustus Edward Hough Love, a renowned mathematician and physicist, who served as the Sedleian Professor of Natural Philosophy at the University of Oxford. Love made significant contributions to the fields of mechanics, elasticity, geodynamics, and electrodynamics, and was a Fellow of the Royal Society. He was known for his exceptional analytical skills, generosity, and kindness towards younger colleagues.
